you need a legitimate TLD, .org, .net,: as llutz_ says, only TLDs that are valid are routed through the net.  (.org, .net, .com, .us, .tk, etc.)
not with .drw, because its not a TLD
you could of course buy a domain through a registrar with some other domain extension, i.e. .com .net .org .info, etc.
